title: Nintendo Does the Right Thing - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.24.19
description:
Go to http://Brooklinen.com and use promo code GAMES for 10% off AND free shipping.

Boost is only available at http://Experian.com/kfgames.

Gary Whitta and Greg talk about Nintendo's new plan to fix Joycon Drift.

Time Stamps - 
00:05:45 - Housekeeping
New Party Mode on patreon.com/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Colton Yoder, Black Jack, and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:07:38 - Nintendo doing the right thing for Joycon Drift, Patrick Klepek @ VICE
00:21:05 - Super Mario Maker 2 Course Upload Limit Doubles, Matt Kim @ IGN
00:26:50 - Control Has Gone Gold
00:31:35 - Harry Potter Mobile Numbers, Matthew Handrahan @ GIB
00:36:44 - Out today
00:39:15 -  EXPERIAN
00:40:30 -  BROOKLINEN
Reader mail   -
00:41:52 - Gary, we've been talking about movie actors in video games. I don't entirely comprehend your job as a screenwriter. Does it include casting? - 2038 Pokémon CEO
00:45:48 - Why do leaks catch on so easily and spread so quickly? - The Nano Biologist
00:51:00 - I recently played through Firewatch and for me, it was one of those rare games where once you pick it up, you just can't put it down. I played through the entire game in one sitting and I loved every second of it. My question is, have you ever played a game cover to cover in one sitting? If so, what game and what do you think made the game so impossible to put down? - Paul Potter AKA PureSeduction50
00:53:15 - What advice would you give to a Platinum Hunting noob? - Josh
00:57:13 - Squad Up: David Scott(Teamfight Tactics) - DemonWaffle
00:59:15 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Greg and Davis from Warp Zone
GAMESCAST: Thursday, July 25th @ 2:30 p.m. - Tim, Greg, Andrea, and Davis
